name: Talo
tagline: All‚Äëin‚Äëone AI translator: calls, events, streaming & API
description: Talo offers real-time voice translation across video calls, live events, offline presentations and streaming broadcasts. Use bots or the desktop app to translate meetings, or integrate via our API. Make every conversation accessible globally.

name: TrustMRR
tagline: The database of verified startup revenues
description: The database of verified startup revenues. Browse Stripe-verified MRR and revenue from real startups. Prove your revenue publicly.

name: Emma
tagline: AI Nutrition intelligence that understands food globally
description: Emma is AI that understands food globally. It reads any label in any language, uncovers hidden sugars, harmful additives, toxins and allergens, and tells you what‚Äôs safe. No databases. No guessing. Just personal health clarity, anywhere.

name: Happyverse
tagline: Create an interactive AI video avatar of yourself!
description: Create an AI avatar that looks, sounds, and thinks like you in under 5 minutes. Just upload a short video and your documents, and your avatar will engage website visitors, answer questions, and share your voice 24/7. It is faster, simpler, and more affordable than the alternatives. Whether you are a coach, founder, or creator, Happyverse helps you scale your presence with real personality, not robotic animation.

name: YouArt
tagline: An agentic workflow studio to create high-quality creatives
description: YouArt is a creative agent that orchestrates models, tools, and prompts into lightweight creative workflows. A Creative Studio built for vibe-driven designers and creators. Build reusable workflows, iterate fast, and export production-ready assets.

name: C1 Artifacts API
tagline: Build AI apps that can generate stunning slides and reports
description: Let your users generate interactive slides and reports right within your AI app, fully on-brand. Easy to create and edit with prompts, and share with a link. Integrate in just 3 steps or try it as an MCP in your favorite AI app.

name: MindPal
tagline: Multi‚Äëagent automation to build, deploy, and run AI teams
description: Your expertise is your moat. MindPal codifies your decision-making, frameworks, and knowledge into proprietary AI agents and multi-agent workflows that deliver your genius 24/7‚Äîto your team and clients. While competitors use personal AI assistants, you're building scalable assets. Join 50k+ experts, coaches, and agencies today.

name: Clik - Cursor for Video
tagline: We turn video editing into a conversation.
description: Clik allows creators and video pros to edit through conversation. Just upload your footage, describe the story you want to tell, and get a video edit back in seconds. Make finishing touches through conversation, traditional timeline edits, AI search, or our AI-powered storyboard. Clik gives you time back to focus on tasks that actually impact the creative outcome of a video, instead of spending all day scrubbing.

name: The Cloud for AI Agents
tagline: Spin up secure sandboxes in ~100 ms
description: Hopx lets you spin up fully isolated Linux micro-VMs in ~100 ms ‚Äî perfect for running AI agents, notebooks, or untrusted code safely at scale. Each sandbox runs in its own Firecracker microVM, with full state persistence, SDKs for Python, JS, Go, and more. No cold-start lag. No runtime limits. Just raw performance and security.

name: Omnilingual ASR
tagline: Advancing automatic speech recognition for 1,600+ languages
description: Meta's Omnilingual ASR is an open-source (Apache 2.0) speech recognition model supporting 1,600+ languages. It uses an LLM-based architecture that can be extended to new languages with just a few in-context examples, without retraining.

name: Graphis
tagline: All-in-one AI workspace for creative teams
description: Graphis is a new kind of platform for creators and agencies to manage AI content projects. Built by creatives, for creatives ‚Äî it combines an infinity canvas for organizing models and assets with real-time client communication in one seamless flow. No nodes, no chaos ‚Äî just a clear, human-first way to create, manage, and scale AI-powered work.

name: Task Sentry
tagline: Block distractions, not websites.
description: Stop using focus tools that block your work. Task Sentry uses local AI to understand your intent. It blocks the right things at the right time, acting as your external willpower. üß† Smart: Knows the difference between procrastination & research. üîí Private: 100% local processing. Your data stays yours.

name: Circle
tagline: Your playground to create, remix, and collab with AI
description: Circle is where creators and AI collide ‚Äî a playground for turning imagination into art, chaos, and collaboration. Create, remix, and connect with a fearless community that believes creativity should never follow the rules.

name: Draftboard Warm Intro Agent
tagline: Warm intros made easy with autonomous agents
description: Your network is incredibly valuable, but leveraging that value is next to impossible - enter Draftboard. Our autonomous agent maps your network to identify the people best positioned to make intros to your targets - for sales, fundraising, recruiting, you name it. No more having endless profile tabs open and scrolling mutual connections pages as your eyes droop from fatigue. Draftboard's agent identifies, maps and scores your intro paths - and makes it seamless to ask for those intros.

name: SnipBox
tagline: Simple, fast, and private clipboard history for your Mac
description: SnipBox is a privacy-first clipboard manager for macOS that remembers everything you copy - without ever touching external servers. - Secure iCloud sync only - your data stays yours - No tracking, no accounts, no analytics - Instantly recall any copied text, link, or snippet - Lightweight, fast, and feels native on Mac - Free for 10 items - unlimited with SnipBox Pro Never lose what you‚Äôve copied again.

name: Pitch AI Actions
tagline: On-brand text and stunning visuals in your presentations
description: Create better slides faster with AI in Pitch. Apply your brand tone, adapt content for any audience, and transform visuals with ease.

name: Dropstone
tagline: A self-learning AI IDE that evolves with your code
description: Dropstone is the world‚Äôs first self-learning AI IDE that evolves with your code. It builds long-term memory across sessions, learning from your workflow and adapting to your development style. Powered by MCP Server, Computer Use API, Ollama model support, Claude Code integration, and Agent Mode, Dropstone transforms coding into collaboration‚Äîan AI that understands, remembers, and grows alongside you.

name: Pin It
tagline: Dynamic Island, iOS App, Shortcuts
description: Send Text or Image to Dynamic Island in app or via shortcuts. Switch Posts without open app. pure simplicity and elegance

name: Loophole
tagline: Onboard your employees 10x faster with AI on-screen help
description: Loophole is an invisible AI assistant for work and life. It reads your screen, answers instantly, and gets things done. Connect it to Slack, Notion, Google Drive and more to speed up onboarding with proactive guidance that prevents mistakes. It also helps everyday consumers with routine tasks and meetings, sending messages, scheduling events, and updating docs based on context. Always ready and hidden during screen share.

name: Mixy
tagline: Make Mashups
description: Mixy lets anyone remix music without knowing how to DJ. ‚Åï Add your songs ‚Åï Instantly blend vocals and beats ‚Åï Play and share your mashup anywhere
